title: New 3Di database schema
content:
We are currently working on a large overhaul of the schematisation Spatialite. We will switch to GeoPackage as file format. The database schema (table names and column names) will also be redesigned.

The new database schema will be released to all users on January 28th, 2025. In the meantime, you can prepare yourself for any changes to your workflow. Also make sure to update any SQL or Python scripts that interact with the schematisation.

Double-click this message for more information.

title: Join the Nelen & Schuurmans Technology User Day 2025 on June 19th
content:
The Nelen & Schuurmans Technology User Day 2025 will take place in Utrecht on June 19th.

During this afternoon, the use of our software tools and applications will be highlighted through use cases.

Double-click this message to sign up!

title: 3Di is transitioning into Rana
content:
We're excited to announce that 3Di is transitioning into Rana - the next generation platform for hydrological modeling and analysis. Rana introduces a collaborative and intuitive experience, with access to trusted simulation tools seamlessly integrated.

Stay tuned for updates as we roll out Rana across our ecosystem: https://www.ranawaterintelligence.com/
